send_resolved.description: SendResolved controls notify about resolved alerts.

text.description: The text body of the teams notification.

title.description: The title of the teams notification.

webhook_url.description: The incoming webhook URL one of `urlSecret` and `url` must be defined.

webhook_url_secret.description: URLSecret defines secret name and key at the CRD namespace. It must contain the webhook URL. one of `urlSecret` and `url` must be defined.
